game_description: War of Wizards is a VR MOBA game that combines unique spell-casting mechanics and tower defense to bring you a VR experience like no other. In War of Wizards, how you draw your spells determines the power of the magic! With prompts in-game, you don't need to remember the spells - focus on the strategy instead! As a wizard player, you'll enter epic magic battles where every move counts. With a mission to destroy the enemy wizard's crystal while protecting your own, you must carefully build your magic deck, quickly react to changes on the battlefield, use the best counter at the right moment, and lead your minions to victory! Key features: - Tower defense gameplay rewarding quick thinking, strategic planning, time management, and leadership - Unique spell-casting mechanics making you feel like a true master of magic - Magic power determined by the size and accuracy of the spells you draw - Balanced spell repertoire for you to experiment - Options to play against strangers, friends, or AI bots - Continuous updates & support! Draw to cast spells, unlock your magic talents, and dominate the battlefield TODAY!
review_1: I used to like this game the reason I said used to is because I don’t know why but my triggers don’t work but on other games they do
review_2: If you wanna get into a game while it’s being developed but isn’t a bad game, this is it. It’s just all around a pretty good game. While it definitely needs work I love playing and can’t wait to see what more they do with it. Moreover the developers are very active in the community and genuinely wanna help improve the game.
review_3: What can I say, except, it's a great game. An AMAZING game if you were like me as a kid, waving sticks around pretending you were a wizard just like every fantasy movie out there. Harry Potter, Lord of the Rings, etc. Except now, you can REALLY see the spells and their effects as you do battle against your opponent. The game is SO fun and as a wide variety of compents to spell casting, all while staying simple for anyone to be able to play. So come and have fun with us!
review_4: I try this game with the free trial of 20 minutes. What can i say expect that it’s really addictive. Winning just by strategy is so satisfying ! Letting your opponent casting all his summon spells while your preparing a nuke is really fun x) !
